statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND protocol = 'HTTP';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE id = 1 AND source_ip = '192.168.0.1';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND data_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM intrusion_attempts WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND protocol = 'SSH';
DELETE FROM intrusion_attempts WHERE attempt_type = 'SQL Injection';
DELETE FROM detected_intrusions WHERE intrusion_type = 'SQL Injection';
DELETE FROM intrusions WHERE intrusion_type = 'SQL Injection';
